greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Binomial matrix (1,10^n) read by antidiagonals.
formula: As a triangle T(n,k) read by rows, T(n,1) = 1, T(n,n)=10^(n-1), and T(n,k) = T(n-1, k) + T(n-1, k-1) otherwise. - _Joerg Arndt_, Dec 10 2016
results.author: _Mark Dols_, Aug 30 2009
